title: Là CAFE Nguyễn Văn Linh
address: 29D Đ. Nguyễn Văn Linh, Hưng Lợi, Ninh Kiều, Cần Thơ

reviews.name: Phan Thị Trúc Huỳnh
reviews.review: good good

reviews.name: ZERDALI
reviews.review:
My experience at the restaurant was quite good
🌟 Regarding price: I find the price quite good in general compared to study cafes in Can Tho, ranging from 28K or more.
🌟 About the atmosphere: I feel good to study, meet deadlines, do group assignments,...
🌟About service and staff: In my opinion, it's quite good, there's still room for improvement in terms of enthusiasm and warmth towards customers, but they're also polite, and the shop has thoughtfully prepared necessary items and drinks.
💌 One thing I don't like is the location of the electrical outlet and the type of electrical outlet because it makes me feel like it's not convenient to pin. You can go to the shop to experience it to have more objective assessments 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

reviews.name: Ái Nguyệt Tiêu
reviews.review:
First time experiencing a coffee shop with a super large space and many tables and chairs for customers.

The shop's model is diverse, with a coffee shop combined with a study and meeting space. There is also coffee in bed/box, overnight coffee,... All are very cool air-conditioned. There is a table reservation service at the restaurant
Menu has quite a lot of drinks. If you buy to take away, the price will be the same 20k/cup.
Order at the counter, pay and serve yourself water 😐
I don't like the shop's milk coffee, it's too sweet, like candy, but the coffee doesn't smell very fragrant. In general, the coffee here is mild.

reviews.name: liên ngọc
reviews.review: Oder staff has a gloomy attitude and goes to drink water, thinking it's a joke asking for a drink, too bad. This is the first time I've met a restaurant, the staff is so bad 😱

reviews.name: Quốc Nguyễn
reviews.review:
The ordering staff spoke quickly but it was too soft to hear. The ordering counter staff was not friendly.
Cute parking attendant

reviews.name: Hoàng Duy
reviews.review:
I asked the staff to clean it up, but after more than 30 years, I still couldn't find it, a bunch of trash left by previous customers. Too bad!
With the whole upstairs being so noisy, there needs to be a silence sign!

reviews.name: Piw Doan
reviews.review: I heard about the promotion so I went but the experience was so bad. The toilet is dirty, there is no faucet, the room is not cleaned thoroughly and there is trash left by previous guests, there is an advertisement for a bathroom but after only opening a few days the bathroom is broken, the water is not very good, just drink for fun :)) Cute, enthusiastic staff. In short, I guess I'll just come here to let you know and won't come back if the restaurant doesn't change :))

reviews.name: NGUYỄN VŨ VIỄN PHƯƠNG
reviews.review: The restaurant has beautiful decor, airy space, delicious drinks. Especially the gift is so beautiful

reviews.name: ngoc chan
reviews.review: The space is quite large, quiet, suitable for studying and working

reviews.name: que anh le
reviews.review: An unpleasant experience at La cf NVL. As a customer who has visited many times and was very satisfied with the service the previous times, this time the staff asked me to change tables with a disrespectful attitude such as kicking the customer out while the customer was sitting. Extremely bad attitude.

reviews.name: Thu Huynh
reviews.review: Delicious salted cocoa, spacious and comfortable space, with cafe bed. When you go to the cafe, you will also receive a rabbit 🐰🥰

reviews.name: Vy Thảo
reviews.review: There are staff who are very friendly with customers

reviews.name: Linh Phan
reviews.review:
Open space, meeting groups to chat with friends is very convenient, open 24/7 so it's convenient to work from late at night until morning.
The staff are very enthusiastic, especially those who work the night shift, they are very supportive and talk sweetly

reviews.name: Vũ Trường Trần
reviews.review:
The shop is spacious
Cool space
Cool and suitable for studying, working and chatting

reviews.name: Hoang Loi
reviews.review: The restaurant space is spacious and the water is relatively stable.

reviews.name: Poly Khô Gà (Càng Ăn Càng Mê Ly)
reviews.review: The modern space serves well, but the Wifi network is often weak and not good

reviews.name: Tung Trieu Phuoc
reviews.review: The staff are very cute. Knowing I needed a quiet space, I arranged and supported it for me. Deserves 5 stars 😁 …

reviews.name: Anh Phương
reviews.review: Depending on the day or whatever, the air conditioner was adjusted twice by the staff but it was still hot

reviews.name: Buongbinh03 Cobe
reviews.review: Staff chases guests away (unprofessional)

reviews.name: Thúy Kiều
reviews.review: Attentive service staff

reviews.name: Anh Thư
reviews.review: The staff is lovely and the restaurant has a beautiful space

reviews.name: duyen duyen
reviews.review: Bad drink shop, unpleasant staff attitude

reviews.name: Dung Choi
reviews.review: Cute shop, lovely staff

reviews.name: Mix_ PéXoài
reviews.review: Wifi is weak, cannot run any website

reviews.name: Yến Kim
reviews.review: Delicious water, good service

reviews.name: Ngoc Khanh
reviews.review: Large, quiet space, suitable for studying and working

reviews.name: Thanh Nguyên Nguyễn (Solomon)
reviews.review: It's okay but the price is a bit steep

reviews.review: bed room is too hot
